column1: #Text=[0176] Suppose Jane plans to apply to a graduate school.
#Text=Before filling out the forms and paying the application fees, she would like to estimate her chances of being admitted.
#Text=Since she does not know the admission criteria, she decides to learn the admission concept by induction.
#Text=She randomly calls up a few friends who applied last year and obtains the information shown in Table 3.

#Text=Joe high high false true Mary high low true true Emily high low true true Lulu high high true true Anna low low true false Peter low high false false Mike high Low false false Pica low low false false
#Text=[0177] There are three predicates in this problem, as shown in the table.
